name: R5-MedicationStatement-R4B-MedicationStatement
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 MedicationStatement into FHIR R4B

element.display: Record of medication being taken by a patient

target.display: Record of medication being taken by a patient
target.comment: R5 `MedicationStatement` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MedicationStatement`

element.display: Indicates whether the medication is or is not being consumed or administered
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Details of the reason for the current use of the medication

target.comment: R5 `MedicationStatement.category` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `MedicationStatement.category` - category changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1); category changed the binding strength from Example to Preferred
R5 `MedicationStatement.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MedicationStatement.contained`
R5 `MedicationStatement.dateAsserted` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MedicationStatement.dateAsserted`

element.display: Link to information used to derive the MedicationStatement

target.comment: R5 `MedicationStatement.derivedFrom` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MedicationStatement.derivedFrom`

element.display: Details of how medication is/was taken or should be taken

target.display: Details of how medication is/was taken or should be taken
target.comment: R5 `MedicationStatement.dosage` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `MedicationStatement.dosage` - dosage has change due to type change: R5 `dosage` `Dosage` maps as RelatedTo for R4B `dosage`

element.display: The date/time or interval when the medication is/was/will be taken

target.display: The date/time or interval when the medication is/was/will be taken
target.comment: R5 `MedicationStatement.effective[x]` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `MedicationStatement.effective[x]` - effective[x] has change due to type change: R5 effective[x] Timing has no equivalent or mapped type in R4B effective[x]

R5 `MedicationStatement.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `MedicationStatement.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `MedicationStatement.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MedicationStatement.id`
R5 `MedicationStatement.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MedicationStatement.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `MedicationStatement.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MedicationStatement.implicitRules`

element.display: Person or organization that provided the information about the taking of this medication

target.display: Person or organization that provided the information about the taking of this medication
target.comment: R5 `MedicationStatement.informationSource` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `MedicationStatement.informationSource` - informationSource changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1)
R5 `MedicationStatement.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `MedicationStatement.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred
R5 `MedicationStatement.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MedicationStatement.meta`

R5 `MedicationStatement.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `MedicationStatement.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

R5 `MedicationStatement.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `MedicationStatement.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `note`

R5 `MedicationStatement.partOf` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4B `MedicationStatement.partOf` - partOf has change due to type change: R5 `partOf` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4B `partOf`

element.display: Reason for why the medication is being/was taken
Link to information relevant to the usage of a medication
Full representation of the dosage instructions

target.display: active | completed | entered-in-error | intended | stopped | on-hold | unknown | not-taken
target.comment: R5 `MedicationStatement.status` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `MedicationStatement.status` - status has INCOMPATIBLE required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-statement-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-statement-status|4.3.0
R5 `MedicationStatement.subject` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MedicationStatement.subject`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `MedicationStatement.text` maps as Equivalent to R4B `MedicationStatement.text`
